name: Avantor, Inc.
description: Avantor, Inc. is a global supplier of ultra-high-purity materials and custom services for the life sciences and advanced technology sectors. Founded in 1904, the company has evolved significantly from its origins in providing chemical products to laboratories, now operating in over 30 countries. Avantor is dedicated to advancing science by providing innovative solutions and tailored services that meet the specific needs of its customers. The company offers a comprehensive portfolio of products including reagents, consumables, and equipment used in research, development, and manufacturing processes across various industries such as pharmaceuticals, biotechnology, and diagnostics. Avantor emphasizes its commitment to sustainability and safety, striving to minimize environmental impact while delivering high-quality products and services. With a focus on innovation, Avantor continues to invest in research and development to enhance its offerings and support the evolving needs of its clients. Its mission is to empower scientists and engineers to achieve their goals by providing the highest quality materials and services.

seo.meta_title: Avantor, Inc. | Global Supplier of Ultra-High-Purity Materials
seo.meta_description: Avantor, Inc. is a leading global supplier of ultra-high-purity materials and custom services for life sciences and advanced technology sectors. Explore our innovative solutions.

faq.question: What does Avantor specialize in?
faq.answer: Avantor specializes in providing ultra-high-purity materials and custom services for the life sciences and advanced technology industries.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Avantor?
faq.answer: Michael Stubblefield is the CEO of Avantor, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Avantor headquartered?
faq.answer: Avantor is headquartered in Radnor, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Avantor offer?
faq.answer: Avantor offers laboratory supplies, including reagents, consumables, and equipment, as well as custom manufacturing and supply chain solutions.
